description: Crowdfunding has become big business for companies like Kickstarter and Patreon. This 'corporate crowdfunding tax' can sometimes burden small projects. Is it time to kick commercial crowdfunding to the curb? Let's share new strategies for DIY marketing and funding project online with Open Source tools
title: OSB 2015 - Free Your Money: Open Source Crowdfunding Tips & Tools - Skyler Corbett
